definition: lit. carved in bones and engraved in the heart (idiom)/fig. etched in one's memory/unforgettable
quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals

sentences.english: Retain the most memorable kiss, kissing the man failed to keep.

sentences.english: It also has something profound. That is the sanguinary nature of human beings.

sentences.english: They were unable to erase the deep fear of scarcity both had acquired in childhood.

sentences.english: This kind of inspirational guidance indeed made impressions deep into one's mind as if carved onto bones.

sentences.english: Once you take friendship seriously, it's gonna be more unforgettable than love.

definition: to leave (on a long journey)/to part from sb
